title: Geography Problem-Solving Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geographical concepts and fundamental understanding of digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Emphasizing practical geography knowledge and creative problem-solving skills required for national exams

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze geographic data to write project reports solving community issues.
Learners can create digital maps applying basic GIS (Geographic Information System) concepts through collaboration with peers.
Learners can accurately solve over 80% of national exam-style geography questions by reflecting on formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
